title: "Getting And Cleaning Data"
---


## Repository Contents

This repo contains five following files:

* run_analysis.R - The script written to load and clean the original data and save the final tidy data.
* CodeBook.Rmd - Document that describes the variables
* UCI Data Set.zip - The data that was used for the project. 
* tidy_UCI_data.csv - Saved final data set for reference
* README.Rmd - It's this file :)
